# Janua

> Self-hosted OAuth2/OIDC authentication platform. Open-source Auth0/Clerk alternative built with FastAPI. 318+ API endpoints, 8 SDKs, SAML SSO, WebAuthn/Passkeys, enterprise RBAC. AGPL v3.

Janua is a monorepo authentication platform deployed on Kubernetes (K3s/Hetzner) via Cloudflare Tunnel. The FastAPI backend (Python 3.11+) provides 38 router modules and 36 services. Frontend apps include Dashboard, Admin, Docs, Website, and Demo. Official SDKs: TypeScript, React, Next.js, Vue, Python, Go, Flutter, React Native.

Production URLs: api.janua.dev (API), app.janua.dev (Dashboard), admin.janua.dev (Admin), docs.janua.dev (Docs), janua.dev (Website). PostgreSQL + Redis infrastructure with RS256 JWT, field-level Fernet encryption, and rate limiting.

## Documentation

- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): Complete AI agent instructions, development commands, debugging guide, key file locations
- [AI_CONTEXT.md](AI_CONTEXT.md): Quick reference — critical paths, ports, architecture summary, agent directives
- [docs/README.md](docs/README.md): Full documentation index with guides for developers, DevOps, and product teams
- [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt): Comprehensive technical reference with inline API details

## Architecture

- [Architecture Overview](docs/architecture/ARCHITECTURE.md): System design, patterns, and infrastructure topology
- [API Entry Point](apps/api/app/main.py): FastAPI application with all router registrations
- [Configuration](apps/api/app/config.py): All environment variables, feature flags, and security settings
- [OpenAPI Spec](apps/api/openapi.yaml): Complete API schema definition

## API Reference

- [Auth Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/auth.py): Authentication — signup, signin, email verification, password reset, magic links (18 endpoints)
- [Users Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/users.py): User CRUD, profiles, avatar, search (12 endpoints)
- [Organizations Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/organizations.py): Multi-tenancy, member management, roles, settings (18 endpoints)
- [MFA Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/mfa.py): TOTP enable/disable, verify, backup codes, recovery (9 endpoints)
- [Passkeys Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/passkeys.py): WebAuthn/FIDO2 credential management (8 endpoints)
- [OAuth Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/oauth.py): OAuth provider authorization and token exchange (7 endpoints)
- [OAuth Clients Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/oauth_clients.py): OAuth2 client CRUD, secret rotation (10 endpoints)
- [OAuth Provider Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/oauth_provider.py): Full OAuth 2.0/OIDC Authorization Server — authorize, consent, token, userinfo, introspect, revoke (7+ endpoints)
- [SSO Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/sso.py): SAML 2.0 enterprise single sign-on (10 endpoints)
- [SCIM Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/scim.py): SCIM 2.0 user and group provisioning (14 endpoints)
- [RBAC Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/rbac.py): Role-based access control and permissions (9 endpoints)
- [Roles Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/roles.py): Custom role management and permission assignments (9 endpoints)
- [Policies Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/policies.py): Policy management, evaluation, role management (10 endpoints)
- [Admin Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/admin.py): Platform administration, stats, health, maintenance mode (23 endpoints)
- [Webhooks Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/webhooks.py): Event subscriptions and delivery (12 endpoints)
- [Compliance Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/compliance.py): GDPR, data export, consent management (11 endpoints)
- [Audit Logs Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/audit_logs.py): Security audit logging with cursor-based pagination (6 endpoints)
- [Sessions Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/sessions.py): Session management, activity tracking, revocation (7 endpoints)
- [Devices Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/devices.py): Trusted device management (7 endpoints)
- [API Keys Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/api_keys.py): API key CRUD, rotation, scoped permissions (6 endpoints)
- [White Label Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/white_label.py): Custom branding, domains, email templates, themes (14 endpoints)
- [Migration Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/migration.py): Auth0 migration, data portability (10 endpoints)
- [Health Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/health.py): Health checks, readiness, liveness, circuit breaker status (6 endpoints)
- [Alerts Router](apps/api/app/routers/v1/alerts.py): Alerting rules, notification channels (15 endpoints)

## Services

- [Auth Service](apps/api/app/services/auth_service.py): Core authentication logic
- [JWT Service](apps/api/app/services/jwt_service.py): RS256/HS256 token issuance and validation
- [OAuth Service](apps/api/app/services/oauth.py): OAuth provider integration (Google, GitHub, Microsoft, etc.)
- [SSO Service](apps/api/app/services/sso_service.py): SAML assertion handling
- [Email Service](apps/api/app/services/email_service.py): Transactional email delivery
- [RBAC Service](apps/api/app/services/rbac_service.py): Permission evaluation engine
- [Audit Service](apps/api/app/services/audit_service.py): Security event logging
- [Compliance Service](apps/api/app/services/compliance_service.py): GDPR/SOC2 compliance operations
- [Webhook Service](apps/api/app/services/webhooks.py): Event dispatch and delivery
- [Risk Assessment Service](apps/api/app/services/risk_assessment_service.py): Login risk scoring

## SDKs

- [TypeScript SDK](packages/typescript-sdk/README.md): Core API client with full type safety
- [React SDK](packages/react-sdk/README.md): Hooks (useAuth, useUser, useOrganization) and components
- [Next.js SDK](packages/nextjs-sdk/README.md): App Router middleware, server components, route protection
- [Vue SDK](packages/vue-sdk/README.md): Vue 3 composables and components
- [Python SDK](packages/python-sdk/README.md): Async/sync clients with type hints
- [Go SDK](packages/go-sdk/README.md): Go service integration with context support
- [Flutter SDK](packages/flutter-sdk/README.md): iOS/Android/Web with biometric auth
- [React Native SDK](packages/react-native-sdk/README.md): Cross-platform mobile SDK

- [Auth0 Migration](scripts/migration/README.md): Automated migration tool ($24k-58k/year savings)
- [Deployment](docs/deployment/DEPLOYMENT_DETAILS.md): Docker, Kubernetes, and production setup
